p: To confirm identified known and novel miRNA in vitro, 6 randomly selected known miRNAs including miRs 156, 166b, 166m, 393, 395, 399, plus the 9 novel miRNAs were reverse transcribed using stem-loop primers, followed by PCR and gel visualization. All the tested known and predicted miRNAs were amplified as expected ( Fig 7), indicating reliability of the obtained sRNASeq results.
